Text: Your Expense ReportsMark Do you have copies of your March April and June expense reports You have an outstanding recievable balance with Enron totaling If you have copies of these reports your balance can be cleared There are also an oustanding items totaling from It looks like you may have only partially expensed a dollar advance that was recieved in If you can provide me with information to resolve these items it would be greatly appreciated Thanks Brea X AC

Your Receivable AccountHello So that your privacy can be respected I have blind copied each of you in this bulk email I am Brea Allen a summer intern with the international group I am assisting Thao Nguyen in reconciling the employee receivable accounts I have been asked to work with each of you to clear out the open items in your receivable account that were incurred prior to your employment with EBS I will be contacting you individually to discuss this matter Your cooperation is both needed and appreciated If you are aware of the balance in your account please contact me so that I will not waste time researching known issues Thanks Brea X AC
